panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together

targets.expr: (sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="192.168.1.123:9100",job="rpi-k8s-master", mode!="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="192.168.1.123:9100",job="rpi-k8s-master"}[$__rate_interval])))) * 100
